task.title: Using PowerPoint with Computers
task.shortdesc: PowerPoint is a simple program that adds a lot of value to presentations and speeches. Using this program successfully can be the difference between a powerful and exciting speech, or a lackluster and boring speech.

taskbody.context: Below are the steps for creating a simple PowerPoint presentation.

step.cmd: Add your information to the slides and structure it the way you plan to give your speech or presentation.
If you would like to make the presentation more exciting, add slide transition effects and animations. Include pictures to give the slides more value.
